### Steps to reproduce
1、enable witness
2、br restore data
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=minioadmin;export A
WS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=minioadmin;/br restore full --send-credentials-to-tikv=true --pd http://tc-pd.e2e-oltp-tikv-network-fault-r
pt-witness-tps-1471313-1-121:2379 --storage s3://benchmark/tpcc-1000-4.0 --s3.endpoint  http://minio.pingcap.net:9000 --check-re
quirements=false
3、
/pd-ctl schedule add shuffle-region-scheduler
/pd-ctl schedule add shuffle-leader-scheduler
/pd-ctl schedule add random-merge-scheduler
4、run workload
go-tpc tpcc run -D tpcc --host tc-tidb.e2e-oltp-tikv-network-fault-rpt-witness-tps-1471313-1-121 -P4000 --warehouses 1000 -T 64 --time 36000m --ignore-error '2013,1213,1105,1205,8022,8027,8028,9001,9004,9007,1062

### What did you expect?
all tikvs are normal

### What did happened?
two tikvs panic
